column4: Also is there anyway to vpn to an ubuntu box so that I can play with ubuntu which will be installed on a headless box?
Do an Ubuntu Server install (no Xorg), set up SSH-server
do you know is there a way I can install it on the headless machine from my windows desktop over the LAN?
There is, which requires network booting and mounting an ISO, I've seen it written up, but you'll have to search the Ubuntu WIKI for it
